articles.title: Mother who tattooed her eyeballs blue and purple is losing her sight - Daily Mail
articles.description: Law student Anaya Peterson, 32, from Belfast,  is facing permanent blindness after a suspected reaction to the eyeball ink and admits she regrets having the procedure.
